unnormalised: Hey everyone, any news on Dhawan's injury? Hope he's back soon! Remember the Sholay dialogue, "kitne aadmi the?" Well, kitne players fit hai now, haha? Last I heard, he twisted his ankle during practice in Bangalore. Doctor at AIIMS Delhi said it'll be a few weeks. Also, is Bumrah okay? Saw something about him pulling a muscle during the last match in Chennai. Fingers crossed for a speedy recovery! Come on India!
normalised: "Hey everyone, any news on Dhawan's injury? Hope he's back soon! Remember the Sholay dialogue, "kitne aadmi the?" Well, kitne players fit hai now, ha ha? Last I heard, he twisted his ankle during practice in Bangalore. Doctor at A I I M S Delhi said it will be a few weeks. Also, is Bumrah okay? Saw something about him pulling a muscle during the last match in Chennai. Fingers crossed for a speedy recovery! Come on India!"
